articles.description: Nuvama Institutional Equities expects BHEL’s new thermal execution to pick up from FY25 end/FY26.
articles.content: Shares of BHEL jumped more than 6 percent on November 13. The stock is seeing recovery from when it fell last week after the company reported dismal Q2 numbers. For the quarter ended September 2023, … [+3359 chars]

articles.title: 10 foods rich in vitamin K to include in your daily diet - Recipes
articles.description: Here we list some vitamin K-rich foods to include in your diet.
articles.content: Spinach is another green leafy vegetable that is high in vitamin K. You can easily add it to omelets, salads, smoothies, dals, or any other cooked dishes.

articles.title: Where is the market headed in Samvat 2080? Top fund managers and market experts answer - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Most of the analysts polled by CNBC-TV18 are expecting earnings growth for the next financial year to be between 12.5% and 15%. The next bunch with a higher percentage are projecting the earnings growth to be between 15% and 17.5%.

articles.title: Diwali brings cheer to retailers, sales to surpass pre-Covid levels - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Expectations are that business would show high single digit growth versus last year. Also, the marriage season will start by last week of November and this should help businesses," estimates Retailers Association of India.
articles.content:
